volunteering.organisation: Google Developer Students Clubs, VIT Vellore
volunteering.description: Worked on projects and participated in hackathons as a part of the Tech domain. Held informative sessions for students on topics such as socket programming. Helped organise events such as WomenTechies '22, '23 and DevJams '22, in which I was a panel member for the judging process.

experience.description: Interned at NITI Aayog, the apex think tank of the Government of India, as part of the Science and Technology (S&T) Vertical. Built web pages and database schemas for some government projects. Constructed a well-received research report on FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) for Government in India, and associated opportunities, challenges and case studies.
Built production-grade cross-platform mobile applications, and developed a Shopify store for an ecommerce platform. Developed a portal for a sports-oriented product with live information tracking.

Developed a zero-and-higher level UI-component library using Storybook.js in collaboration with a team, and set up a central styling control with data from Strapi. Created a subscription form for a real-estate info service.
